You plan to visit 5 European cities for 23 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 7 days in Brussels. You have to attend a workshop in Brussels between day 5 and day 11. You want to spend 3 days in Frankfurt. You plan to stay in Valencia for 5 days. You want to meet a friend in Valencia between day 13 and day 17. You want to spend 7 days in Stuttgart. You would like to visit Vienna for 5 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Frankfurt and Stuttgart, Frankfurt and Valencia, Vienna and Stuttgart, Valencia and Stuttgart, Vienna and Valencia, Vienna and Frankfurt, from Brussels to Frankfurt, Vienna and Brussels, Brussels and Valencia.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 23 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
